init.title: Options
init.description:
Sensor updates are only ever done when a Bluetooth advertisement is seen, so the rate limit is a way of throttling updates if the device is sending out a lot of advertisements.

It is recommended to select the appropriate battery chemistry as the BM2 by default is extremely optimistic with regards to percentage and overall state!
